common_patterns.description: Validate database problems exist in production with real metrics before optimization
JSONB schema design for ML metadata storage with sub-100ms response times
Data structure design eliminates complex query logic and special-case handling

architecture_patterns: PostgreSQL 15+ with JSONB optimization for ML metadata
Connection pooling optimized for high-concurrency analytics
Schema-first design eliminates complex transformation logic
Real behavior testing with testcontainers for database validation
configuration_insights: JSONB indexing strategies for flexible ML metadata queries
Connection pool sizing based on real workload patterns
Query simplicity through proper data modeling

optimization_insights.insight: JSONB optimization for ML metadata storage achieved sub-100ms response times through proper schema design
PostgreSQL connection pool optimization enabled high-concurrency analytics queries with minimal resource overhead
